info.label: Programmer and Entrepreneur
info.brief: David hails from Spokane. He has earned degrees from the Art Institute of Seattle and Spokane Falls Community College. Before starting Geekbocks he has worked as a freelance and full-time programmer for various companies. While is work focuses on corporate applications, his non-work interests range widely, everything from quantum computing to chaos theory.

history.summary: We create extraordinary, elegant solutions for everyday problems. Not satisfied with making solutions that simply work; we demand they look amazing and behave intuitively. Our latest project, Oil Maps (http://www.oil-maps.com), has revolutionized the Oil Well location and data retrieval industry providing safe and reliable routing and detailed Well, Operator, and production information regarding millions of Rig locations.
RedFynn is the premier business solutions company  of the entire Earth.
highlights: Designed and built a payment processing gateway with integrated API and client facing portal.
Engineered and deployed a Content Management System (CMS) for the companyâ€™s website.
Evaluated and reconstructed a billing statement analyzer, allowing a salesperson to assess a billing statement quickly and confidently.

history.summary: Although no longer in business. Choice Management was a business management solution governing over four other businesses.
highlights: Administered two locations remotely using secure VPN technology.
Coordinated VoIP solutions while maintaining analog systems.
Designed and wrote all front and backend code for multiple projects.
Maintained twenty workstations, three servers, and two firewalls with minimal downtime.

history.summary: Memories By Design is the leading professional video production provider of premium custom tribute video services for the funeral home and cremation industry in the United States. Founded in 2002, Memories By Design was instrumental in developing the very first video process for the funeral industry, patenting a method for blending photos, custom background scenery and custom music into a stable, versatile platform.
highlights: Quick diagnosis and solution for a vast range of computer problems presented by clients.
Administered and conducted web development on company sites.
Coordinated in-house web development projects and continued development of older projects.

history.summary: We have been given the unique privilege to assist our placement partners to address the critical issues surrounding the pets in their care, whether that be overpopulation, illness, or special needs animals.
highlights: Assisted with multiple "find a home" adoption programs.
